issue.title: Have you used PySR in your research? Share your paper!
issue.body:
Have you used PySR in a research paper to discover or rediscover some symbolic model?

If so, please add your paper to the following research showcase: https://astroautomata.com/PySR/#/papers

You get publicity for your paper as an example of symbolic regression, and others get to see different ways of using PySR!

To add your paper here, please submit a pull request adding information about your paper to this YAML file: https://github.com/MilesCranmer/PySR/blob/master/docs/papers.yml. You can include an image in the `docs/images` folder, and that image will show up on the research showcase page (most recent paper at top).


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7593028/166510250-ff15f36a-341f-47da-a5ee-2cd9b870f423.png)
